features: INFUSED WITH CLEAN, EFFECTIVE INGREDIENTS - The clean ingredients like Glycerin & Shea Butter provide lightweight nourishment and bounce to skin without ever feeling heavy or greasy on the surface. Anti-aging powerhouse vitamin A promotes visible firmness to skin, offsetting the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
DAILY LOTION THAT DELIVERS RESULTS - The preferred daily lotion by Inked Magazine, this fragrance-free, universal moisturizer provides lightweight, long-lasting hydration without leaving skin greasy.

INCLUSIVE BODY CARE MADE FOR ALL - Designed for those with or without ink to hydrate, replenish and promote healthy-looking skin, it helps keep skin from losing essential moisture and naturally occurring compounds that can leave it vulnerable to damage and premature aging.

HYDRATING TATTOO SKINCARE CREAM - Backed clinically by dermatologists, our body lotion is non-allergenic and paraben-free to work as a sleek tattoo brightener - the perfect lotion for dry, itchy skin!
TATTOO TIP - For newer, more irritable tattoos apply our Soothing Gel first to help calm itchiness and sensitivity! Daily Lotion will help lock in, and double up on the soothing relief.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is great tattoo lotion but also very good for everyday body lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: High quality thick lotion. A little bit covers a large area and leaves your tattoos feeling moisturized. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars there is no other out there. by far the best
reviews.reviewText: Look I spent 35 years on this earth and I never would never put lotion on. why to feeel sticky and smell like the child that the parents hated and coverd them in sun screen at the beach... NO thank youBUT when after watching the blue print guy I started to think dam I should take care of my body more The least i could do is try to put some lotion on ..plus I just got engaged so I dont care how i smell to other girls...Thats when I came across this product.. it just blew me out of the water. no sticky feeling no smell and it makes my tats POP... im talking about a nice deep color coming back hell I started to pay attention to the tat i frogot under my arm.. dam it looks nice.... not only that I started to look at them and say dam they look good ! I should really get back in shape and loose the 30 lbs I gained during covid.... so yeah you can say this lotion changed my life (pending i loose the weight) but dont hold me to it lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pump and scent
reviews.reviewText: I love the mad rabbit items make tattoos look great. It moisturized the skin great even though the.pump doesn't work well. Would love if it was sented coconut vanilla like the other products because they smell so good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product brought up tattoos I didn’t even I know I had. Like when I was college girl in the early 2000s I got a tramp stamp. Forgot it was there. Then when I was getting a tribal arm band while I was pro wrestler (they called me Ripper John). I rubbed this on my bicep and the tattoo showed up. Now that I’ve got tough guy tattoos. Ya know fingers and necks. This works on those too. What ever the fad this works on all tattoos.Except infinity symbols. This product will make infinity symbols fall out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like it, but it's not very different from fragrance free version of Lubriderm. Expensive for the size of the bottle. Still giving 5 stars bc it doesn't clog pores or feel too greasy. Absorbs quickly and I love that it's unscented. Works very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars way smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: lotion applies well, dries pretty quick without greasy feel. it almost absorbs too quick - i had to use several pumps for each arm and each leg, so this wont last long. its pretty expensive for the size of the bottle. i was happy there was no scent, as some "tattoo" products always linger with a whiskey or tobacco or some other fake tattoo-inspired scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is fantastic!
reviews.reviewText: Helps tattoos heal and stay fresh looking a lot longer
